data.text: @hauntedmutual @taydrug @PemaJigme1 Yeah she was definitely being fake af, and bullying is never ok. My only point is that it’s not the same as  making every weird thing Kanye does out to be a symptom from his mental issues. It makes others with mental health problems look bad. People don’t wanna hear that though🤷🏾‍♀️
@taydrug sis this was all the way back in april ... why are you bringing this back now 👀

@taydrug @PemaJigme1 Since you’re gonna share this too I’ll say it again. I never said that bullying was okay or that Taylor wasn’t bullied. What I said was that calling someone a snake isn’t the same thing as making fun of their mental illness.

@taydrug @slutforbreathin Still not the same as making fun of a mental illness. I didn’t say it was okay, I said it’s not the same. Idk how it’s been six months and you still can’t understand what I’m saying. You had all summer to reread those tweets! 🤦🏾‍♀️
